name: Doll City: Prologue
description:
Doll-CityVR is VR game based on the cyberpunk universe of the comic book Potentiel, adapted and reimagined to propose a unique VR experience. It's a mix of contemplative exploration and different types of gameplay.

Doll-City VR teleports you inside an agonizing cyberpunk world, feeling like you're living the very last acid trip of a junkie.

A comic book / virtual museum of a universe in which corruption and decadence coexist with angels, beauty and wonders.

Welcome to the razor's edge, in the madness of a waking nightmare, where drugs slowly grind away the last hopes of the Doll-City megalopolis.
